# pxc_pve_inventory (Data Source)

Fetches the pve inventory of the associated target pves cloud domain

## Schema

### Read-Only

- `cloud_domain` (String) The overarching cloud domain of the inventory
- `inventory` (String) Pve inventory as yaml string
